TopicTitle: [Tutorial] Spaceplanes - the basics of building and flying successful aircraft

Articles.Content:
So I was having some fun with spaceplanes a few days ago while the forums were down and I thought that since a lot of people have recently gotten into the game they may not be having as much fun as me... what with planes having such a steeper learning curve than rockets in this game.

Here's a comprehensive look at what you need to know for your plane to:

a)stay up in the air

b)be controllabe

b)go fast

c)land (on the runway)

Enjoy! - and let me know your thoughts either in this thread or the comments on Youtube
